subSubSection.paragraph: Mexico, Cayman Islands, Belize, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua, Colombia, Venezuela, Costa Rica, Trinidad & Tobago, Brazil, Ecuador, Peru.
Distribution in Venezuela: Vargas, Carabobo, Monagas, Bolivar !.
